climatePledgeFriendly.details: OEKO-TEX STANDARD 100 requires textiles-based products to be tested against a list of 1,000+ chemicals, to limit those which may be harmful to human health. Certification focus: #ProductSafety and #ChemicalsUsed.

features: 【Timeless Vintage Design】: This oriental rug features boho inspired floral medallion pattern, combination ornate details and distress effect add a touch of sophistication.The rugs for bedroom aesthetic seamlessly blends timeless vintage design with natural charm, ideal add for a eclectic charm and warm feel to your decor space.

【Soft & Non-Shedding Rug】: This boho rugs is crafted from premium polyester fibers faux wool, the soft and gentle material is friendly to pets and children's skin.The low-pile brick red rug boasts high density , pile almost non-shedding.The ultra soft touch protect your feet from cold and hard floors, providing unmatched comfort and warmth.

【 Non-Slip Area Rug 】: Our bohemian rug with high quality non slip backing material TPE make our entrance rugs indoor perfect for high traffic areas. Protect your loved ones from slips and falls, including kids, pets, and elderly family members. The lock edge design reinforcement make our indoor outdoor rug durable.

【Easy to Clean Washable Rug】: The floral rug for bedroom is easy to care for and washable,. Maintain its fresh appearance with regular vacuuming for daily upkeep. For a deeper clean, toss it into the washing machine on a gentle cycle with cold water and no need for bleach. Air dry to preserve its quality. Enjoy the convenience of a washable rugs that effortlessly combines style with practicality.

【Multi-Purpose 2.5x8 Rug】: The washable rugs runner 2.5 x 8 is perfect for use as front indoor door mat,bathroom runner rug,kitchen runner rugs non skid washable, bedside rug, porch rug,laundry room rug etc,this throw rugs can add a touch of luxury for your home, and it's also perfect for high traffic areas.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 3, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Really great quality - feels so nice and washes up easily!
reviews.reviewText: This rug is super plush and soft - it feels wonderful under your feet!The blue color is really pretty, too.I love that it’s so easy to pop in the washer when it gets dirty.If you’ve got kids and/or animals at home, washable rugs like this one will truly make life easier!PRO TIP: If you need to get pee or poop out of rugs, don’t fret. Pop the rug into the washing machine with your normal detergent AND add white vinegar. Maybe like a cup for a heavily soiled rug. Vinegar helps break up the enzymes in urine and the rug will come out squeaky clean!I stopped paying big bucks for cleaners like Nature’s Miracle when I learned that vinegar works just as well!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 8, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Was skeptical at first but has won me over.
reviews.reviewText: Firstly, at first glance this is not a very nice rug. The pattern is clearly printed on, fabric is very thin, seems like the bare minimum. I'll be damned if it somehow is perfect for the task I gave it. The bottom of the rug grips great, the creases from being folded while shipping disappeared after a day. The fabric they've used is also slippery. I wanted this rug for my work from home setup. I sit in a silly ornate wooden chair that is really comfy.The texture of this rug allows for this chair to glide cleanly around my space to pull up to the desk without any pull on the rug. It feels soft and nice under my feet, vacuums well. My only concern is the printing will wear with time. It does feel somewhat cheap even if it works fantastically for it's job. which is why i knocked a star off.Other than that, it does look nice and it does work. Good product.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 3, 2024
reviews.reviewText: This rug is beautiful and so soft! It has a very nice rubber backer, so it doesn't slide all over the floor and sticks well to the hardwood without leaving residue behind. The rug itself is nice and pliable so it seems like it will be easy to wash in the washing machine if needed. The rug fibers are medium length to give it that nice fluff while walking over it. This is a very high-quality rug, and we will definitely be getting a second to match in our hallway.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 5, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I ordered this rug in the 2 feet x 6 foot size and it is true to the size. It looks good and lays down nicely. This rug can be machine washed cold and hung to dry, but Do Not tumble dry, dry clean or iron this rug per the care tag.
